description: Main entry point for a Flutter mobile application, defining the app structure with MaterialApp and a simple Scaffold with placeholder content.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up MaterialApp with themes and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen with a title passed via constructor.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI for MyHomePage, displaying a loading message.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, launching the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp returning MaterialApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for _MyHomePageState constructing the UI layout.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
